Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO BUDGET AND REVENUE

Title: Increases the tax exemption amount on clothing and apparel items from one hundred ten dollars to two hundred dollars
Summary: Increases the tax exemption amount on clothing and apparel items from one hundred ten dollars to two hundred dollars.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to increasing the tax exemption amount on clothing and apparel items from one hundred ten dollars to two hundred dollars
